snippet: Scientists have documented a steep rise in throat cancers caused by HPV that can be transmitted through oral sex. Now, about 70 percent of all throat cancers are caused by HPV.
abstract: Admission by actor Michael Douglas that he believes his throat cancer was caused by infection from oral sex highlights trend that has alarmed many scientists; researchers have documented steep rise in throat cancers caused by human papilloma virus, or HPV, which can be transmitted through oral sex; about 70 percent of all throat cancers are caused by HPV.
lead_paragraph: Scientists have documented a steep rise in throat cancers caused by HPV that can be transmitted through oral sex. Now, about 70 percent of all throat cancers are caused by HPV.

headline.seo: Throat Cancer Link to Oral Sex Gains Credence
headline.main: Throat Cancer Link to Oral Sex Gains Notice
headline.print_headline: Throat Cancer Link to Oral Sex Gains Notice
